June 01, 2016
Wednesday 4:00 pm (11:00 pm JKT/BKK)
Limitless

LIMITLESS is a fast-paced drama based on the feature film. Brian Finch (Jake McDorman) discovers the brainboosting power of the mysterious drug NZT. He is coerced by the FBI into using his extraordinary cognitive abilities to solve complex cases for them.
